data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Neopsocopsis (Psocodea, " Psocoptera ", Psocidae), with one new species from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Lu-Xi, Yoshizawa, Kazunori, Li, Fa-Sheng, Liu, Zhi-Qi (2012): A review of the genus Neopsocopsis (Psocodea, " Psocoptera ", Psocidae), with one new species from China. ZooKeys 203: 27-46, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.203.3138, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.203.3138
